The animated shortfilm Pear Cider and Cigarettes involves an alcoholic canadian expat suffering from hepatitis and liver failure waiting in a Chinese hospital for a “prisoner” to “die” so he can get they’re liver. Funny thing is that the film  is based on real events as seen through the eyes of the film’s director who flies to China to help him and i didn’t know that till after i first watched it, watching it again makes it even more F’ed up knowing he flies back to Vancouver with a REAL murder victim’s liver inside him!
